<s>appear when cut pe to be perfectly symmetrical.
The two sides of the brain <\s> [It should be remembered that the two sides of the brain 
are not of <s>the same <\s> equal size, & hence make a per-
pendicular section as accurately as is possible.
the two hemispheres are never cut through 
precisely at the same part. It will be noticed 
in all my drawings that this is borne out,
the one side, although agreeing generally with 
the other, never being exactly <s>the same <\s> a counterpart of it 
[Previous to cutting the sections the convolutions 
were <s>all <\s> coloured distinctively with a mixture of various <s>certain <\s>
in powder & gold size. This mixture 
adheres to the arachnoid so that having a key 
to the parts coloured it is always possible to 
tell wh: convolution is under consideration 
<s>[text?]<\s> Unless this is done utter confusion will 
be the result as there is nothing more misleading 
than the appearance of the convolutions when 
cut in different planes.
